UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A Novel Dual-Targeted α-Helical Peptide With Potent Antifungal Activity Against Fluconazole-Resistant Candida albicans Clinical Isolates.
Literature.Author: Yang Y, Wang C, Gao N, Lyu Y, Zhang L, Zhang S, Wang J, Shan A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=64 µM,Intestinal Porcine Epithelial Cells IPEC-J2:8% Killing=64 µM,Porcine mammary epithelial cells PMEC:11% Killing=64 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans CGMCC 2.2086(MIC=32µM),Candida tropicalis CGMCC 2.1975(MIC=8µM),Candida parapsilosis CGMCC 2.3989(MIC=16µM),Candida albicans(MIC=32µM),Candida albicans(MIC=16-64µM)
